title: Rajwadi Polki Jhumka: A Timeless Diamond Cascade
materials: Setting in White Gold for Diamond Enhancement. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Jhumka showcases the brilliance of uncut Polki diamonds in a classic design. The top features a floral motif, while the pear-shaped dangle features a large, striking triangular Polki diamond. The diamonds are intricately set in a grid pattern, ensuring maximum light reflection and sparkle. The 'Kundhan' setting, a hallmark of Rajasthani craftsmanship but widely used in Hyderabadi jewelry, adds to its regal appeal.
occasions: and other special occasions where a touch of traditional grandeur is desired. Suitable for both traditional Telugu attire and elegant evening wear.
description: This Polki Jhumka is a testament to timeless elegance. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique, antique charm. The handcrafted Kundhan setting ensures the stones are secure and beautifully displayed. The Hyderabadi polish enhances its longevity and brilliance, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Own a piece of regal heritage!
